dcterms:description: A dataset containing high-resolution scans of humans in different poses and corresponding triangle meshes, used as ground truth reference for evaluating meshing algorithms.

dcterms:description: An information-rich 3D model repository containing a diverse set of 3D shapes, used for evaluating the capability of meshing algorithms on various object categories.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet

dcterms:description: A robust and scalable method for generating watertight manifold surfaces from triangle soups, used for preprocessing models in the experiments.
